definition: a small slit, as for inserting a coin or depositing mail, assign a time slot
details:
noun
- a small slit, as for inserting a coin or depositing mail
= example: a small slit, as for inserting a coin or depositing mail
- a slot machine that is used for gambling
= example: a slot machine that is used for gambling
= synonyms: one-armed bandit
- a socket in a microcomputer that will accept a plug-in circuit board
= example: a socket in a microcomputer that will accept a plug-in circuit board
= synonyms: expansion slot
- a position in a grammatical linguistic construction in which a variety of alternative units are interchangeable
= example: a position in a grammatical linguistic construction in which a variety of alternative units are interchangeable
- the trail of an animal, especially a deer
= example: the trail of an animal, especially a deer
- a position in a hierarchy or organization
= example: a position in a hierarchy or organization
- a time assigned on a schedule or agenda
= example: a time assigned on a schedule or agenda
= synonyms: time slot
verb
- assign a time slot
= example: assign a time slot
